title: White House Announces ‘Cyber Trust Mark’ Labeling Initiative for Smart Devices

title: New Study Shares Doubts Electric Vehicle Transition Can Really Reduce Carbon Emissions

title: LIVE 9 AM ET: House Armed Services Committee Hearing on Artificial Intelligence on the Battlefield

title: House Republicans Seek Transparency on Meta’s Content Moderation Policy on Threads
description: This combination of file photographs created on June 22, 2023, shows SpaceX, Twitter and electric car maker Tesla CEO Elon Musk during his visit at the Vivatech technology startups and innovation fair at the Porte de Versailles exhibition center in Paris on June 16, 2023, (right) and Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg testifying before the House Financial Services Committee in the Rayburn House Office Building in Washington on Oct. 23, 2019. (Mandel Ngan, Alain Jocard/AFP via Getty Images)
